name: Online Fire Reporting System /request-details.php文件SQL注入漏洞
product: ["Online Fire Reporting System Online Fire Reporting System 1.2"]
description: Online Fire Reporting System是一个在线火灾报告系统。Online Fire Reporting System存在SQL注入漏洞，该漏洞源于文件/request-details.php中参数requestid缺少对外部输入SQL语句的验证。攻击者可利用该漏洞执行非法SQL命令窃取数据库敏感数据。
solution:
目前厂商尚未发布升级程序修复该安全问题，详情见厂商官网：
https://phpgurukul.com/
